headline: Earnings Could Power Further Stock Market Gains. Broadcom’s Report Is One to Watch.
summary: U.S. stocks could extend their impressive bull market run well into next year even if the economy shows signs of tariff fatigue as companies continue to generate solid profit growth and with the Federal Reserve expected to lower benchmark borrowing costs.  Corporate earnings, in fact, are likely to remain the key plank in the broader bull market thesis over the coming months.

headline: Broadcom earnings: Why this expert is 'incrementally concerned'
summary: Broadcom (AVGO) is set to release its third quarter results on Thursday after the closing bell, offering investors more insight into the state of the artificial intelligence (AI) market. Freedom Capital Markets managing director Paul Meeks joins Market Catalysts with Julie Hyman to discuss his expectations for the earnings print. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts.
